sub_title: MsC in Earth Structure and Dynamics /Ambassador of GeoLatinas Mexico/Co-leader of GeoSeminars in GeoLatinas/Sedimentologika's Steering Committee member
summary:
I am an enthusiastic and hard-working Master of Science in Earth Estructure and Dynamics keened to be part of the energy transition in order to fulfill the global aim of reducing the CO2 emissions. 

With over 6 years of experience in the oil and gas industry, 6 months in geothermal consultancy, and specialized in cap rock and lateral sealing analysis. Skilled in software usage. 

I am always finding ways to improve my work, I'm open to new challenges pursuing a career focused on geological research and practical application of the gained experince and knowledge. 

Las but not least I am a proud member and leader of GeoLatinas organization and part of the steering committe of Sedimentologika DOA Journal.
